suppressedMessages.message: Unexpected any. Specify a different type.

suggestions.desc: Use `unknown` instead, this will force you to explicitly, and safely assert the type is correct.
Use `never` instead, this is useful when instantiating generic type parameters that you don't need to know the type of.

source:
import { Head, Link, usePage } from '@inertiajs/react'; import { AnimatePresence, motion } from 'framer-motion'; import { Check, ChevronRight, Code, Globe, Layout, Zap, BarChart, Shield, Terminal } from 'lucide-react'; import { Button } from '@/components/ui/button'; import { Card, CardContent, CardDescription, CardFooter, CardHeader, CardTitle } from '@/components/ui/card'; import { login, register } from '@/routes'; import type { SharedData } from '@/types'; import type { Portfolio } from '@/types'; // eslint-disable-next-line @typescript-eslint/no-explicit-any const FeatureCard = ({ icon: Icon, title, description }: { icon: any, title: string, description: string }) => (

{title}

{description}

 ); export default function Landing({ portfolios = [] }: { portfolios: Portfolio[] }) { const { auth } = usePage().props; return (
{/* Navbar */}
Portfolify.app
{auth.user ? ( ) : ( <> )}
{/* Hero Section */}
{/* Text Content (6 columns) */} Portfolio Online for Developers

Build Your Professional Portfolio in Minutes.

Showcase your projects, skills, and experience with a stunning, fast, and SEO-optimized portfolio. Get your own unique URL instantly.

{/* Image/Icon Content (4 columns, offset by layout) */}
{/* Features Section */}

Everything You Need

Powerful features designed for developers, by developers. Focusing on speed, design, and ease of use.

{/* Pricing Section */}

Simple, Transparent Pricing

Start for free, upgrade when you need more power.

{/* Free Plan */} Free Perfect for getting started
Rp 0/mo
  • Public Portfolio URL
  • Up to 5 Projects
  • Basic Analytics
  • Standard Theme
 {/* Pro Plan */}
POPULAR
Pro For serious professionals
Rp 49.000/mo
  • Unlimited Projects
  • Custom Domain Support
  • Advanced Analytics
  • Premium Themes
  • Remove Branding
{/* CTA Section */}

Ready to Showcase Your Work?

Join hundreds of developers building their personal brand with Portfolify.

{/* Featured Portfolios Section */} {portfolios.length > 0 && (

Featured Portfolios

Check out what others are building with Portfolify.

{portfolios.map((portfolio) => (

{portfolio.title}

by @{portfolio.user?.username} {portfolio.category}
))}
)} {/* Footer */}
Portfolify.app

{new Date().getFullYear()} Portfolify. All rights reserved.

Privacy Terms Contact
); }

messages.message: The 'closeLightbox' function makes the dependencies of useEffect Hook (at line 98) change on every render. To fix this, wrap the definition of 'closeLightbox' in its own useCallback() Hook.

suggestions.desc: Wrap the definition of 'closeLightbox' in its own useCallback() Hook.
